GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

reviews.title: Settlers of Catan: Don't Settle For Less
reviews.review_body: You have stumbled across an uncharted island rich in natural resources, but you are not alone; other adventurers have come ashore too, and the race to settle the island of Catan has begun! Whether you exert military force, build a road to rival the Great Wall, trade goods with ships from the outside world, or some combination of all three, the aim is the same: to dominate the island. Will you prevail? Proceed strategically, trade wisely, and may the odds be in favour.

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves a single review of the given review_id

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves up an array of objects consisting of all the comments from the input review id

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves up an object consisting of  the posted comment

Request Body.format: an object containing the correct body information - { username: a valid username in the database in the form of a string, body: a paragraph of the comment in the form of a string}.

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: updates the vote in the given review_id review

Request Body Guide.format: an object containing the correct body information - { inc_votes: a number to either increment (e.g 2) by or decrement (e.g -2) by }.

GET /api/users.description: serves up an array of all users

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment that the user wants deleting resulting in an empty response and a 204 status code
